state.NAME: THE_FARM
state.text: It's a farm. It's dull and sucks. There is a barn. Oh yeah, also there are fields... but they suck too.

state.NAME: THE_BARN
state.text: On initial glance, you are elated to see that the barn is well-kept and freshly painted. Unfortunately, as you enter, you discover that this barn in fact secretly sucks on the interior.

state.NAME: THE_FIELDS
state.text: These fields suck. The mildly less sucky barn calls to you in the distance. Also, it looks like there is a swamp nearby

state.NAME: THE_SWAMP
state.text: This swamp smells. A large bubble of toxic vapor pops before you, filling your face with a scent similar to cow manure and sewer gas. You are elated to find that this place, in fact, does not suck!
